title: Finger-licking good roast drumsticks
directions: Place the rack in the middle of the oven.
In a large bowl, mix the drumsticks with the sauce. Coat them well. Spread them out on a baking sheet.
In another bowl, mix together the oil, the potatoes and carrots, and add to the baking sheet.
Place the fresh herb sprigs on the baking sheet.
Bake for about 60 minutes, or until chicken pulls easily from the bone and the potatoes and carrots are tender.
Replace the sprigs of fresh herbs with 5 mL (1 tsp.) of the same dried herbs.
Mix the vegetables, oil, and herbs together
Spread everything out on the baking sheet
ingredients: 250 mL (1 cup) Sensations by Compliments No Limits Barbecue Sauce
3 sprigs each of fresh thyme, rosemary, parsley and/or marjoram (choose 2)
